title: How to Know if You're in a Cult | Guest: Michael Shellenberger | 4/11/22
description:
Glenn and Stu discuss President Biden’s latest senior moment. When will Democrats take Biden’s cognitive decline seriously? Pat Gray joins Glenn and Stu to share a video of a woman pastor sacrilegiously praying to a “god of pronouns.” Daily Wire Reporter Mary Margaret Olohan joins to discuss her investigation into a found box of aborted babies and the horrors she saw at an abortion clinic. Glenn and Stu further discuss the issue of abortion and the Left’s extreme ideologies. California gubernatorial candidate Michael Shellenberger joins Glenn to discuss his run for California governor and how his environmentalist views differ from those of the Left. Glenn and Stu discuss the ongoing supply chain issues and how to prepare to feed your family.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
